column1: buy_boats_desc;This is a fix to correct for the fact that artisans and early game industrialization don't simulate or compensate for pre-industrial boat production very well. Only avalible for uncivilized nations.  ... it lets you buy boats ...    Note that the price is well above the market price, but that the market demand is too high for uncivilized nations to get any.;Bonjour au soir mes amis. Je parler francais tres tres maul.;I don't speak german … Wir sind verantwortlich für die Stadt
